WRITING.TITLE: When do I press it? (if at all?)
WRITING.TEXT: Thanks for your upcoming detailed answers.

WRITING.TITLE: Create a new nickname for a CURRENT NFL player, coach, or owner and see if we can guess it!
WRITING.TEXT: So just list the nickname and wait for people to respond. Be sure to let us know when someone gets it right. Have fun!

WRITING.TITLE: Which players have overstayed their welcome? (be sure to specify the franchise)
WRITING.TEXT: Feel free to expand it to coaches/ESPN personalities/players' wives/anyone associated with the NFL

WRITING.TITLE: Why is your favorite player.. your favorite player?
WRITING.TEXT: You can also tell us his name if you want. No pressure.

WRITING.TITLE: For each Eagles QB, how many games do you think they will start?
WRITING.TEXT: It's fine to add draft qbs.

WRITING.TITLE: Which teams will absolutely, positively not reach a Super Bowl within the next 5 years and why?
WRITING.TEXT: I want your 'No Guts No Glory' picks for teams you know deep down are not appearing in one of the next 5 Super Bowls. Sure you can give us your scrub picks of teams that everyone is positive won't make it... but I want your interesting choices as well and WHY you don't think they will appear in a Super Bowl over the next 5 years. Have fun and show your work!

WRITING.TITLE: Which handful of teams do you think will definitely be in Super Bowls in the next five years and why?
WRITING.TEXT: Basically the teams that you are very confident will play in a Super Bowl. You don't have to think they will win. Just represent their conference in the next five seasons. Name those teams and tell us why.

WRITING.TITLE: Why do you like American football?
WRITING.TEXT: Honest question looking for honest answers.
Big Thanks! Is there a way I can speed it up to the normal play speed?

WRITING.TITLE: Dan Fielding's celebratory reaction dance (10 seconds)
WRITING.TEXT:
Here is the Youtube clip. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLiwBj258No
It begins around 2:35 and ends at 2:45. Thank you!

Though the film only consists of two acts and the music was subpar, Jake Gyllenhaal's performance was one part a throwback toward the 70's sociopaths and some of the 80's like King of Comedy... but it was also a step forward for procedural/motive based films. We need more of them. Solid three star film.

WRITING.TITLE: Is Lebron really a top 5 player of all time?
Best gyros in the Indy area?
WRITING.TEXT: Even if they pronounce them incorrectly.

WRITING.TITLE: First try... We did it, Pacerland!

WRITING.TEXT: This is an OP approved post.

WRITING.TITLE: Make up a tweet by someone (associated with the NFL) that would start the most riots.
WRITING.TEXT: Name the person or organization. Write out and/or describe the message. Watch the NFL world catch fire. A series of social media messages is allowed. (like a back and forth between players, etc) You don't have to use Twitter. Could be another social media format like instagram, fb, tinder, etc.

WRITING.TITLE: Your starting QB was just traded for draft picks, where do hope he goes? Where do you hope he doesn't go?
